servinfo.title: DTC P0101: Mass Air Flow Circuit Range / Performance

servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

item.ptxt: MAF volume is greater than 25 g/sec even if engine revolution is less than 900 rpm and intake manifold pressure is less than 45 kPa (6.35 psi) with TP less than 3.0°.
MAF volume is lower than 4 g/sec even if engine revolution is more than 2500 rpm and intake manifold pressure is more than 50 kPa (7.25 psi) with TP more than 15°.
When performing a road test, select a place where there is no traffic or possibility of a traffic accident and be very careful during testing to avoid occurrence of an accident.
Road test should be carried out by 2 persons, a driver and a tester, on a level road.

attention3.ptxt: Check to make sure that the following conditions are satisfied when using this “DTC Confirmation Procedure”.

item.ptxt: Intake air temperature at engine start: –10 °C (14°F) to 80 °C (176 °F)
Altitude (barometric pressure): 2400 m, 8000 ft or less (560 mmHg, 75 kPa or more)

s1.ptxt: With ignition switch turned OFF, connect scan tool.
Turn ON ignition switch and clear DTC using scan tool.
Start engine and warm up to normal operating temperature. (ECT approx. 90 – 95 °C, 194 – 203 °F)
Drive vehicle with engine speed: more than 2500 rpm for 1 min.
Increase vehicle speed to 80 km/h (45 mile/h) at 5th gear or D range.
Release accelerator pedal to decrease vehicle speed to 40 km/h (25 mile/h).
Stop vehicle and run it idle for 1 min.

attention3.ptxt: Before this trouble shooting is performed, read the precautions for DTC troubleshooting referring to Precautions for DTC Troubleshooting:For Petrol Engine Model .

testgroup.question: Was “Engine and Emission Control System Check” performed?

action.ptxt: Go to Engine and Emission Control System Check:For Petrol Engine Model .

testgroup.title: Visual inspection
testgroup.ptxt: Check MAF sensor and air intake system for:

item.ptxt: Objects which block measuring duct and resistor of MAF sensor.
Other air flow which does not pass the MAF sensor.

testgroup.question: Are they in good condition?

testgroup.title: MAF sensor and its circuit check

test1.ptxt: With ignition switch turned OFF, connect scan tool to DLC.
Start engine and warm up to normal operation temperature.

testgroup.question: Is each value within specified range?

testgroup.title: MAF sensor output voltage check

test1.ptxt: Remove ECM from its bracket with ECM connectors connected.
Measure voltage between “C37-26” and “C37-27” terminals of ECM connector referring to Mass Air Flow (MAF) and Intake Air Temperature (IAT) Sensor On-Vehicle Inspection:For Petrol Engine Model .

testgroup.question: Is each value within specified range?

paragroup.ptxt: If OK, substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.

testgroup.title: MAF sensor power supply voltage check

test1.ptxt: Disconnect connector from MAF and IAT sensor with ignition switch turned OFF.
Turn ON ignition switch, measure voltage between engine ground and “BLU/BLK” wire terminal (2) of MAF and IAT sensor connector (1).

testgroup.question: Is voltage 10 – 14 V?

test1.ptxt: Turn OFF ignition switch, measure resistance between “BLU” wire terminal of MAF and IAT sensor connector and engine ground.
Measure resistance between “C37-27” terminal of ECM connector and vehicle body ground.

action.ptxt: “BLU” wire is open or high resistance circuit.

paragroup.ptxt: ECM grounds “C37-58”, “C37-48”, “C37-30”, “C37-29” and/or “C37-15” circuit is open or high resistance.
If wires are OK, substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.

test1.ptxt: Disconnect connectors from ECM with ignition switch turned OFF.
Turn ON ignition switch, measure voltage between “RED” wire terminal of MAF and IAT sensor connector and engine ground.

action.ptxt: “RED” wire is shorted to others circuit.

test1.ptxt: Turn OFF ignition switch, measure resistance between “RED” wire terminal of MAF and IAT sensor connector and engine ground.

action.ptxt: “RED” wire is shorted to ground circuit.

test1.ptxt: Measure resistance between “RED” wire terminal of MAF and IAT sensor connector and “C37-26” terminal of ECM connector.

action.ptxt: “RED” wire is open or high resistance circuit.
Go to DTC P2135: Throttle Position Sensor (Main / Sub) Voltage Correlation:For Petrol Engine Model .
Go to DTC P0106: Manifold Absolute Pressure Range / Performance:For Petrol Engine Model .
Substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
